fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.review: This movie is not your ordinary Hollywood flick. It has a great and deep message. This movie has a foundation and just kept on being built on from their and that foundation is hope.

fields.title: Inception
fields.review: Inception is my number one favorite movie off my twelve years on earth! It's absolutely impossible to explain the incredible that Inception has.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.review: A lot has been said and written about Interstellar. You can obviously take apart any movie that is out there. You'll either love this one or you won't.

fields.title: Parasite
fields.review: This Movie will make you belly laugh, it will chill you to the bone, and it will make you shed a tear. This movie will stay with you long after the credits are over

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.review: Quite simply, the greatest film ever made. Humour, sadness, action, drama and a Vietnam film all rolled into one.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.review: Superb, and truly one of the greatest movies of all time.

fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.review: Jango (D is silence) is just one of those movie you can watch every year and it never gets old.

fields.title: Top Gun: Maverick
fields.review: If there's any movie that deserves to be seen in the theaters with big screens and booming speakers. It's :Top Gun Maverick.

fields.title: Green Book
fields.review: This film proves why movies can be so powerful with a touching, poignant and some times funny story of opposites attract. Enjoyed every moment although it isn't always easy to watch.

fields.title: Good Will Hunting
fields.review: Good Will Hunting is a beautifully filmed movie with striking scenery, and it is directed wonderfully by Van Sant. The music is never obtrusive but never too low-key either, while the story is interesting and compelling and the script intelligently written.
